title: What was life like in 1980s-1990s Korea? - Quora

response.answer_text: Korean was a growing, vibrant country. Life was not as hectic, but moving that way. Things were pretty stable. North Korea made threats, but not nearly as often. The military exercises going on now were also going on the, but pretty much ignored by North Korea. If I remember right, one of the South Korean leaders actually made a short trip to the North. Kim Jong Il was in power at the time. In August 1990, Iraq invaded Kuwait. Some US military units were gearing up to go, mine included. The South Korean military increased its alert status in the North might want to take advantage of the situation.
